repo_notes.content: This repository contains documentation tor The Comindware Platform V5. The main documentation content is in the `./docs` folder. Always generate reference article URLs as `https://kb.comindware.ru/article.php?id={kbId}` where `kbId` is taken from the article frontmatter. PDF files in the root folder contain formatted documentation. kb.comindware.ru.platform_v5_for_llm_ingestion.md contains all the docs in a single MD file with embedded URLs. `phpkb_content/798. Версия 5.0. Текущая рекомендованная` folder contains markdown and html articles from `https://kb.comindware.ru` (may be older than the `./docs` content. Other files are for integration with the PHPKB via SQL and CMW Platform CI/CD.
repo_notes.author: Arte(r)m Sedov
